description: This file declares functions and data structures for a simplified key protection and encryption scheme, including data encryption/decryption, secret key management, and related helpers. It is part of a larger SDK and deals with data security features.

methods.name: simpleProtectConfigData
methods.description: Encrypts data and returns a BASE64-encoded, null-terminated string, requiring the caller to manage memory.

methods.name: simpleUnprotectConfigData
methods.description: Decrypts protected data, returning a null-terminated string, with ownership transferred to the caller.

methods.name: simpleProtectDecrypt
methods.description: Decrypts data using a secret key, returning the plaintext string.

methods.name: simpleProtectEncrypt
methods.description: Encrypts data using a secret key, returning the encrypted string.

methods.name: simpleProtectGetSecret
methods.description: Loads or creates a secret key for encryption/decryption, returning a pointer to the ProtectSecret structure.

methods.name: simpleProtectDestroySecret
methods.description: Clears and frees a secret key.

methods.name: simpleProtectDestroySecret__auto
methods.description: Resource helper for automatic cleanup of a ProtectSecret pointer.
